# Connector Preparation Validation Checklist

## 1. Research & Planning ✓

### Service Analysis
- [ ] Researched target service thoroughly
- [ ] Identified essential components/actions for core functionality
- [ ] Reviewed API documentation (if provided) and verified valid links
- [ ] Incorporated additional requirements into planning

### Component Planning
- [ ] Mapped API endpoints to Appmixer components
- [ ] Covered core CRUD operations where applicable:
  - [ ] Create, Read/List, Update, Delete operations
- [ ] Prioritized actions based on user value and frequency
- [ ] Included service-specific essential actions

## 2. Authentication Research ✓

### Method & Documentation
- [ ] Identified and verified authentication method from official docs
- [ ] Documented authentication flow and requirements
- [ ] Included direct link to official authentication documentation
- [ ] Added step-by-step instructions for obtaining API credentials

## 3. Documentation Quality ✓

### Create Context
- [ ] Organized components in logical order with detailed descriptions
- [ ] Included rationale for component selection
- [ ] Documentation provides clear roadmap for implementation

### Code Generation Compliance
- [ ] **CRITICAL**: NO connector code generated yet (preparation only)
- [ ] Result contains information, not implementation code

## Final Validation ✓

- [ ] Directory structure is correct
- [ ] Context.md exists and contains all required information
- [ ] Authentication research is complete and documented
- [ ] Component planning covers all essential actions
- [ ] Ready for implementation phase
